White_Plains.Scarsdale Golf Club:
Scarsdale Golf Club is a private golf club located in Hartsdale, New York.


== History ==
The club contains the Scarsdale Golf Course, founded in 1898, which was designed by famed golf course architect A. W. Tillinghast. Additionally, the club grounds encompass six har-tru tennis courts, an Olympic-size pool, a small pool, four platform tennis courts, a clubhouse, six bowling lanes, and many other structures along the property.
